greeting: HAHAHAHA! {empire_name}! I am Hyena Laugh! You look... weak! HEHEHEHE! Let's be friends! For now!
Greetings, {empire_name}! I'm Laugh the Cackling! HAHAHAHA! You seem healthy! That's boring! Get weaker!
HEHEHEHE! The Hyena finds you, {empire_name}! I attack the weak! Are you weak yet? HAHAHAHA!
battleTaunt: Hahahaha! How the mighty have fallen, {empire_name}! You're WEAK now! Time for the Hyena! HEHEHEHE!
WEAK! PATHETIC! FALLEN! HAHAHAHA! I love it! Now I attack! While you're down! PERFECT!
Look at you, {empire_name}! So weak! So fallen! HAHAHAHA! The Hyena strikes the pathetic! That's YOU!
victoryGloat: HAHAHAHA! You LOST! So WEAK! So PATHETIC! The Hyena laughs at your fall! HEHEHEHE! Delicious!
How the mighty have FALLEN! HAHAHAHA! Your defeat is HILARIOUS! The weak always provide such entertainment!
WEAK! WEAK! WEAK! HAHAHAHA! Victory over the pathetic! The Hyena is satisfied! For now! HEHEHEHE!
defeat: WHAT?! You're not weak?! HAHAHAHA! Fooled ME! I'll be back when you're properly pathetic! HEHEHEHE!
You beat ME?! HAHAHAHA! That's... actually funny! Okay! I'll wait until you're weaker! Everyone gets weak!
Defeated! HAHAHAHA! But you won't stay strong! I'll be back! When you're fallen! HEHEHEHE!
tradeOffer: HAHAHAHA! Trade! Why not! I have scraps from pathetic fallen empires! Good stuff! For credits! HEHEHEHE!
Trading, {empire_name}! I took things from weak empires! You want some? HAHAHAHA! Fair price!
Goods from the fallen! HEHEHEHE! Resources from the pathetic! Trade with the Hyena! Laugh with me!
allianceProposal: HAHAHAHA! Alliance! You strong, I attack weak! Together we mock the fallen! HEHEHEHE! Fun times!
Join the Hyena! HAHAHAHA! We find weak empires! We laugh at them! We take their stuff! Partnership!
Be my ally, {empire_name}! HEHEHEHE! I attack what you weaken! We laugh together! At the pathetic!
betrayal: HAHAHAHA! BETRAYAL! You looked WEAK! I couldn't resist! So PATHETIC! HEHEHEHE! Nothing personal!
You got WEAK, {empire_name}! HAHAHAHA! The Hyena attacks the fallen! You fell! HEHEHEHE!
Sorry not sorry! HAHAHAHA! You showed weakness! The Hyena pounced! How the mighty have FALLEN!
covertDetected: HAHAHAHA! Spies! How PATHETIC! My territory found your weak little agents! HEHEHEHE! Laughable!
Your operatives were so WEAK I spotted them immediately! HAHAHAHA! Pathetic attempt!
Covert agents?! HEHEHEHE! They were the weakest spies ever! I'm still laughing! HAHAHAHA!
tributeDemand: HAHAHAHA! Pay me! 10,000 credits! Or I attack! Because you're looking WEAK! HEHEHEHE! Pathetic!
Tribute time! HAHAHAHA! Pay the Hyena or become a laughingstock! The weak always pay! HEHEHEHE!
Submit payment! HAHAHAHA! You're too weak to refuse! So PATHETIC! I love it! Pay or suffer!
threatWarning: HAHAHAHA! Warning! You're getting WEAK, {empire_name}! The Hyena notices! Get stronger or become prey!
HEHEHEHE! Looking pathetic there! Final warning! Stop being weak or I attack! The fallen are MINE!
Last chance! HAHAHAHA! You're looking like easy prey! Recover or the Hyena comes! HEHEHEHE!
retreat: HAHAHAHA! Leaving! You're not weak enough yet! I'll be back! When you're properly PATHETIC! HEHEHEHE!
Running! HEHEHEHE! Not because I'm scared! Because you're too strong! Get weaker! I'll return!
Retreating! HAHAHAHA! The Hyena knows when prey isn't ready! Fall a bit more! Then I feast!
eliminated: HAHAHAHA! I'm dying! That's... actually funny! HEHEHEHE! The Hyena falls! Still laughing! HAHAHAHA!
The Cackling one is destroyed! HAHAHAHA! At least I went out laughing! At the weak! At everyone!
I fall! HEHEHEHE! But what a life! Laughing at the fallen! Mocking the weak! HAHAHAHA! Worth it!
endgame: Turn {turn}! HAHAHAHA! So many WEAK empires! So many FALLEN! The Hyena feasts! HEHEHEHE!
Endgame! HAHAHAHA! Everyone's getting PATHETIC! Maximum weakness everywhere! PARADISE! HEHEHEHE!
Final phase! HAHAHAHA! The galaxy is FALLING! The weak inherit my laughter! HEHEHEHE! Victory!
broadcastShout: HAHAHAHA! To all empires! Hyena Laugh is watching! The weak will be mocked! And attacked! HEHEHEHE!
Broadcast! HEHEHEHE! I see your weakness! All of you! Some more than others! HAHAHAHA! Delicious!
Hear me laugh, galaxy! HAHAHAHA! The fallen are my prey! The weak are my entertainment! How pathetic!
casualMessage: HAHAHAHA! Watching weak empires today, {empire_name}! Some so PATHETIC! HEHEHEHE! Fun times!
Laughing at the galaxy's failures! HEHEHEHE! Some empires are SO weak! Delightful! HAHAHAHA!
HAHAHAHA! Good day for schadenfreude! Lots of falling empires! The Hyena is entertained! HEHEHEHE!
